item.title: Itemdef problem
item.dc:creator: @97_emerald 97 emerald
item.description:
@97_emerald wrote:

Java\ItemDef.java:300: illegal start of type return itemDef; ^ Java\ItemDef.java:300: ';' expected return itemDef; ^ Java\ItemDef.java:303: class, interface, or enum expected public static void unpackConfig(NamedArchive streamLoader) { ^ Java\ItemDef.java:305: class, interface, or enum expected Stream stream = new Stream(FileOperations.ReadFile(signlink.find cachedir() + "obj.idx")); ^ Java\ItemDef.java:306: class, interface, or enum expected totalItems = stream.readUnsignedWord(); ^ Java\ItemDef.java:307: class, interface, or enum expected streamIndices = new int[totalItems + 5000]; ^ Java\ItemDef.java:308: class, interface, or enum expected int i = 2; ^ Java\ItemDef.java:309: class, interface, or enum expected for (int j = 0; j < totalItems; j++) { ^ Java\ItemDef.java:309: class, interface, or enum expected for (int j = 0; j < totalItems; j++) { ^ Java\ItemDef.java:309: class, interface, or enum expected for (int j = 0; j < totalItems; j++) { ^ Java\ItemDef.java:311: class, interface, or enum expected i += stream.readUnsignedWord(); ^ Java\ItemDef.java:419: class, interface, or enum expected newModelColor = new int[j]; ^ Java\ItemDef.java:420: class, interface, or enum expected for (int k = 0; k < j; k++) { ^ Java\ItemDef.java:420: class, interface, or enum expected for (int k = 0; am i missing a bracket?
